normal.1: Uses Mehrak to perform up to 4 consecutive attacks.

charged.1: Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes.
charged.2: At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Uses Mehrak's mapping ability for offensive purposes, initiating a radial scan that deals <dendro>AoE Dendro DMG</dendro>. It will also scan all Dendro Cores in its AoE and cause them to immediately rupture.
description.2: Mehrak was created through the modification of ancient technology, and may have some other functions apart from mapping work...

description.0: Completely unleashes Mehrak's energy and creates a cubic scanned space, dealing <dendro>AoE Dendro DMG</dendro> to all opponents within it and granting Kaveh the following enhanced combat abilities for a specific duration:
1: Increases Kaveh's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack AoE, and converts his attack DMG to <dendro>Dendro DMG</dendro> that cannot be overridden.
All Dendro Cores created by all party members through Bloom reactions deal additional rupture DMG.
description.2: These effects will be canceled once Kaveh leaves the field.
description.4: "Every building style includes the architect's unique worldview, and from this angle, one can say that the buildings themselves are coalsescences of human memories."

description.0: When DMG dealt by a Dendro Core (including DMG from Burgeon and Hyperbloom) hits Kaveh, Kaveh will regain HP equal to 300% of his Elemental Mastery. This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s.
During Painted Dome, after Kaveh's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks hit opponents, his Elemental Mastery will increase by 25. This effect can be triggered once every 0.1s. Max 4 stacks.
description.1: This effect will be canceled when Painted Dome's effects end.

description.0: When Kaveh crafts Landscape, Building, and Courtyard-type Furnishings, he has a 100% chance to refund a portion of the materials used.
Within 3.5s after using Artistic Ingenuity, Kaveh's Dendro RES will be increased by 50% and he will receive 50% more healing.
Kaveh's Normal Attack SPD increases by 15% during Painted Dome.
Increases the Level of Painted Dome by 3.
Dendro Cores created from Bloom reactions Kaveh triggers will have their rupture DMG increased by 60%.
Increases the Level of Artistic Ingenuity by 3.

When Kaveh's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks hit opponents during Painted Dome, it will unleash the Light of the Firmament upon the opponent's position, dealing 61.8% of Kaveh's ATK as AoE Dendro DMG and causing all Dendro Cores within that AoE to rupture. This effect can be triggered once every 3s.
